notes.note: **RTSP**: Support RTP/RTCP via UDP/IP and RTSP via TCP/IP
**RTSP**: support for absolute and relative control URLs
Removal of 'About' page in Browser

**Communications**:
 Support the creation of MMS message with Subject

**Communications**:
 Addressing and Sending of  MMS message to Email address

**Communications**:
Call Ended message

**Communications**:
DSDS Import contacts from both SIMs (one at a time)

**Communications**:
Datastore API Support

**Communications**:
 Improved Emergency Call User Interface

**Communications**:
Save draft MMS & SMS messages

**Communications**:
Automatic switching from SMS to MMS when media is added to the message

**Communications**:
SMS & MMS Forwarding

**Communications**:
Confirmation message when changing the PIN code or PIN Unlock Code

**Device**:
 Support for sending multiple files over Bluetooth

**Device**:
BlueDroid Support

**Media**: 
Access to music controls in notifications tray

**Media**:
 Access to music controls from the lock screen when the phone is locked

**Media**:
Enable continuous autofocus in camera

**Media**:
Improved arraignment of content in the gallery app

**Media**:
File information shown for the content shown in the gallery app

**Media**:
Ability to use device speakers with the FM radio app
**Email**: Support for POP3 email servers

**Graphics Support**:
Asynchronous Panning/Zooming in Apps and Web Content for improved performance

**Graphics Support**:
WebGL performance improvements
**Graphics**: Enable Azure content for b2g
**NFC**: Ability to pair with a blutooth device using NFC tags.
**NFC**: Ability to read content from NFC tags
**NFC**: NFC API
**Performance**: Improvements to Scrolling FPS (Frames Per Second)

**RIL**:
 Support for 802.1x EAP-SIM authentication for supported hotspots
**RIL**: DSDS (Dual Sim Dual Standby) Settings added

**RTSP**:
RTSP (Real Time Streaming Protocol) framework support to enable the streaming of content using the RTSP protocol.
**UX**: UX Visual Refresh of application headers and the notification bar.
**Performance**: Improvements to application start times

**Homescreen:**
Easily access your existing apps and discover new apps according to your interests using Smart Collections

### Supported Languages in 1.3
* Bulgarian
* Bengali
* Catalan
* Czech
* German
* Greek
* Spanish
* Croatian
* Hungarian
* Italian
* Dutch
* Polish
* Portuguese (Brazil)
* Romanian
* Russian
* Slovak
* Serbian
* Turkish
* Chinese (Traditional)

**DOM API**:
Contacts API now uses WebIDL [bug 850430](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=850430), with associated changes:

* Date properties now handled consistently across the Contacts code.
* mozContacts.remove now accepts a contact ID for removal.
*  The DataStore API has been enabled by default in B2G for certified apps only [bug 967414](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=967414),and its permissions have been tweaked [bug 871445](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=871445).

**DOM/API**:
Multi-SIM support landed in Firefox OS (Dual-SIM-Dual-Standby or DSDS). navigator.mozMobileConnection becomes an array of MozMobileConnection instances, i.e. navigator.mozMobileConnections.  The privileged subset of this API can be used to detect MCC (country) and MNC (carrier).

**DOM/API**:
The WebIccManager API, which allows support for multiple sim cards, has had updates: iccChangeEvent has been added using using event generator [bug 814637](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=814637)

**DOM/API**:
NFC has had updates:onpeerready and onpeerlost callbacks added [bug 933136](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=933136).

**DOM/API**:
New interface added — checkP2PRegistration — plus the 'ChromeOnly' interfaces eventListenerWasAdded and eventListenerWasRemoved, to support basic PeerToPeer use cases.

**DOM/API**:
New interface added — checkP2PRegistration — plus the 'ChromeOnly' interfaces eventListenerWasAdded and eventListenerWasRemoved, to support basic PeerToPeer use cases.

**DOM/API**:
New interfaces added to MozNfcManager DOM notifyUserAcceptedP2P and notifySendFileStatus [bug 959437](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=959437)

**DOM/API**:
sendFile interface added to MozNFCPeer [bug 933093](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=933093).

**DOM/API**:
The SpeakerManager API has been implemented, to allow usage such as FM Radio outputting to phone speakers [bug 854753](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=854753).

**DOM/ API**:
Notification.get() added to Notification API to provide a way to get current notification objects [bug 899574](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=899574).

**General Gecko**:
The navigator.onLine and console objects have been implemented in Web Workers [bug 925437](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=925437) and [bug 620935](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=620935)
**General Gecko**: The web components ShadowRoot stylesheet behaviour has been implemented [bug 929885](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=929885).
**General Gecko**: JavaScript Pointer Events have been implemented [bug 822898](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=822898).

**General Gecko**: The vtt.js WebVTT JavaScript parser has been added into Gecko [bug 895091] (https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_*bug.cgi?id=895091). On a related note, TextTrack now dispatches TrackEvents [bug 893309] (https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=893309)

**General Gecko**:  The vtt.js WebVTT JavaScript parser has been added into Gecko [bug 895091] (https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_*bug.cgi?id=895091). On a related note, TextTrack now dispatches TrackEvents [bug 893309] (https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=893309)
**General Gecko**: Shared workers are implemented but disabled by default in Gecko 28 (set the dom.workers.sharedWorkers.enabled to true to enable.) They are enabled by default in Gecko 29

###General Gecko:
* WebIDL enum added for for AudioChannel in HTMLMediaElement (see [bug 925594](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=925594)
* HTMLVideoElement.canPlayType('video/webm') now reports maybe. [bug 884275](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=884275)
* The DocumentFragment.getElementById() method has been implemented. E.g. document.createDocumentFragment().getElementById() [bug 933193](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=933193).
* The KeyboardEvent.repeat attribute has been implemented [bug 600117](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=600117)
* The File constructor, e.g. new File(["foo"], "foo.txt") has been implemented. [bug 819900](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=819900)
* The navigator.plugins is no more enumerable, for privacy reasons [bug 757726](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=757726)
* The two attributes Window.screenX and Window.screenY now return CSS pixels (and no more device pixels) [bug 943668](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=943668)
* The two methods CanvasRenderingContext2D.drawSystemFocusRing() and CanvasRenderingContext2D.drawCustomFocusRing() have been implemented. The preference canvas.focusring.enabled must be set to true to activate both [bug 540456](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=540456)
* The following attributes have been added to NavigatorID: appCodeName and product [bug 925847](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=925847)
* Support for the two setRange() methods on the HTMLInputElement interface has been added [bug 850364](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=850364).
* Support for the two setRange() methods on the HTMLTextAreaElement interface has been added [bug 918940](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=918940)
* The method getAllKeys() and openKeyCursor() have been added to IDBObjectStore [bug 920633](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=920633) and [bug 920800](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=920800)
* The HTMLFormControlsCollection interface has been implemented [bug 913920](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=913920)
* The CanvasRenderingContext2D interface supports now the two methods getLineDash() and setLineDash() [bug 768067](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=768067)
* The typeMustMatch attribute has been implemented on the HTMLObjectElement interface [bug 827160](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=827160)
* The copyFromChannel() and copyToChannel() methods have been added to AudioBuffer [bug 915524](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=915524)
* Event.isTrusted() is now unforgeable [bug 637248](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=637248)
* The Navigator.vibrate() method has been adapted to match the final specification: It now returns false when the list is too long or has too large entries, instead of throwing [bug 884935](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=884935)
* As part of the ongoing effort to standardize global objects, the non-standard stylesheet change event interfaces, including StyleRuleChangeEvent, StyleSheetApplicableStateChangeEvent and StyleSheetChangeEvent, are no longer available from Web content. The CSSGroupRuleRuleList interface, the implementation detail of CSSRuleList, has also been removed [bug 872934](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=872934) and [bug 916871](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=916871)
* atob now ignores whitespaces [bug 711180](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=711180)
* WebGL: MOZ_ prefixed extension strings are deprecated. Support for them will be removed in the future. Use unprefixed extension string only. To get draft extensions, set the webgl.enable-draft-extensions preferences [bug 924176](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=924176)
